name: China Jiangsu International Economic and Technical Cooperation Group Co., Ltd.
description: China Jiangsu International Economic and Technical Cooperation Group Co., Ltd. (CJPRY) is a leading multinational enterprise based in China, specializing in engineering, construction, and project management. Established in 1995, CJPRY has grown to become a prominent player in the international construction sector, focusing on infrastructure development, including roads, bridges, and public facilities. The company operates in various regions, including Africa, Asia, and the Middle East, where it provides comprehensive services that encompass design, procurement, construction, and project financing. CJPRY is committed to promoting economic development through its projects, which often include technology transfer and skills training for local workers. The firm emphasizes sustainable development practices, ensuring that its construction projects are environmentally friendly and socially responsible. CJPRY has established a reputation for delivering high-quality projects on time and within budget, bolstered by its strong partnerships with local governments and businesses. With a mission to enhance global connectivity and support local economies, CJPRY continues to expand its international footprint while adhering to the highest standards of safety and quality in construction.

seo.meta_title: CJPRY | Leading International Construction and Engineering Firm
seo.meta_description: Explore China Jiangsu International Economic and Technical Cooperation Group Co., Ltd. (CJPRY), a leader in international construction and engineering services.

faq.question: What services does CJPRY offer?
faq.answer: CJPRY offers a range of services including infrastructure development, engineering, construction, and project management.

faq.question: Where is CJPRY headquartered?
faq.answer: CJPRY is headquartered in Nanjing, Jiangsu, China.

faq.question: In which regions does CJPRY operate?
faq.answer: CJPRY operates in various regions including Africa, Asia, and the Middle East.
